content.text:
# Fujiwara no Akisuke

]]
Fujiwara no Akisuke (, 1090–1155) was a waka'' poet and nobleman active in the Heian period Japan. One of his poems is included in the Ogura Hyakunin Isshu. A member of the Fujiwara clan, he was also known as Sakyō no Daibu Akisuke (). His father was Fujiwara no Akisue and his son was Fujiwara no Kiyosuke.
